A bunch of words by zachleat.

ALARMd is a Google Code Project

Posted on 08 Oct 2008

I received a request this week to participate in development of the internet alarm clock I developed awhile back called ALARMd. It has gone through two major revisions, and my interest in contributing additional source code to the project is waning. I’ve got other projects. So, I’ve decided to publish it to Google Code. I won’t be doing new development on the project, but will accept patches and commits to the repository. Feel free to ask me for project member status.

See ALARMd on Google Code.
